description.en:
ZrCoin is the first ever blockchain option for investing in the production of an in-demand industrial material.
ZrCoin is not susceptible to inflation or typical cryptocurrency volatility. As such it is a reliable tool for the preservation and growth of capital funds

ico_data.description: ZrCoin is an investment-grade blockchain product. It is aderivative that leverages both cutting-edge financial and industrial technologies to manufacture and sell a highly in-demand product, synthetic zirconium dioxide (Synth. Zr–û2), which is traded on the global market of refractories.
